from pymilvus import MilvusClient, DataType​
​
schema = MilvusClient.create_schema()​
​
schema.add_field(​
    field_name="my_id",​
    datatype=DataType.INT64,​
    # highlight-start​
    is_primary=True,​
    auto_id=True,​
    # highlight-end​
)​

import io.milvus.v2.common.DataType;​
import io.milvus.v2.service.collection.request.AddFieldReq; ​
import io.milvus.v2.service.collection.request.CreateCollectionReq;​
​
CreateCollectionReq.CollectionSchema schema = client.createSchema();​
​
schema.addField(AddFieldReq.builder()​
        .fieldName("my_id")​
        .dataType(DataType.Int64)​
        // highlight-start​
        .isPrimaryKey(true)​
        .autoID(true)​
        // highlight-end​
        .build());​
);​

import { DataType } from "@zilliz/milvus2-sdk-node";​
​
const schema = [​
  {​
    name: "pk",​
    description: "ID field",​
    data_type: DataType.VARCHAR,​
    is_primary_key: true,​
    max_length: 100,​
  },​
];​

export primaryField='{​
    "fieldName": "my_id",​
    "dataType": "Int64",​
    "isPrimary": true​
}'​
​
export schema="{​
    \"autoID\": true,​
    \"fields\": [​
        $primaryField​
    ]​
}"​

schema.add_field(​
    field_name="my_id",​
    datatype=DataType.VARCHAR,​
    # highlight-start​
    is_primary=True,​
    auto_id=True,​
    max_length=512,​
    # highlight-end​
)​

import io.milvus.v2.common.DataType;​
import io.milvus.v2.service.collection.request.AddFieldReq; ​
​
schema.addField(AddFieldReq.builder()​
        .fieldName("my_id")​
        .dataType(DataType.VarChar)​
        // highlight-start​
        .isPrimaryKey(true)​
        .autoID(true)​
        .maxLength(512)​
        // highlight-end​
        .build());​

schema.push({​
    name: "my_id",​
    data_type: DataType.VarChar,​
    // highlight-start​
    is_primary_key: true,​
    autoID: true,​
    maxLength: 512​
    // highlight-end​
});​
